title: MedicusUnion Telemedicine
description:
MedicusUnion: seamless video consultations with globally leading physicians, expert advice in one platform

Long Description APP Store & Play Market

Get access to numerous advantages:

Consult with doctors globally via video calls, regardless of your location
Obtain second opinions from esteemed specialists
Schedule appointments at your convenience to save time and hassle
Access live interpreter support during consultations for seamless communication with your doctor, regardless of language barriers
Receive assistance in organizing your treatment in abroad

MedicusUnion brings together top-tier physicians from leading healthcare nations, known worldwide for their exceptional standards of care. With years of practical experience and esteemed qualifications, our specialists stand at the forefront of global medical excellence. At MedicusUnion, we're dedicated to making high-quality doctor care accessible to everyone.

Consultations with physicians take place via video calls. To ensure accessibility for all, we provide professional translation services by live interpreters during the call, eliminating language barriers between you and your doctor. Our experts adeptly translate during online consultations and can also convert medical reports into your preferred language.

The process of booking an online consultation is simple. You just need to:

register on our App
search and find the physician that meets your health needs
fill in the in-built form
upload your documents
send the request to the doctor

Next to online consultations, we also provide assistance with the organization of your medical treatment abroad.

After a video consultation, you can seamlessly move forward with arranging additional treatment abroad, if required. Leveraging our extensive 15-year expertise in telehealth, we specialize in coordinating comprehensive medical care. From identifying the most suitable doctor and clinic, facilitating the acquisition of a medical invitation for visa processing to providing interpreter assistance throughout your entire treatment journey, we take care of everything!

Take your next step forward with MedicusUnion and enjoy a better and more accomplished version of doctor consultations.
